page.title: 04A GALA AT THORNHILL
page.content: There was a{gala}in Thornhill on Saturday. The Dewsbury Rose {Majorettes}were there. There were lots of{stalls.} There was a{tombola} stall, they nearly always have them, and they also had a stall where people were selling{buns and cakes,} crisps and pop. They were{home-made} buns and cakes, they were very nice. There was a 10p{lucky dip,}which I had a go on, but there was not a lot in the lucky dip. There were some {balloons}there as well. The Dewsbury Rose Majorettes came on at 5.30 p.m. They were dressed in red and white. They were on for half and hour. The gala finished at 6.30 p.m.
